description.en:
Hyakkimaru is boy befallen and surrounded by tragedy. Before he was born, his father Daigo aspires to rule Japan and does so by making a pact with 48 majin. 

His side of the bargain? 48 of the body parts of his soon-to-be born son. Hyakkimaru, now a disfigured and horrid looking infant that can no longer be called human, is cast away by his family.

Years later, Hyakkimaru, now a young man, makes it his life goal to hunt down the 48 majin and restore his body parts, having already gained some by the time we see him. 

Along this journey, he comes across a brat in danger who goes by Dororo. After being rescued, Dororo becomes a pest that Hyakkimaru can't seem to shake. 

With Dororo's cunning, and Hyakkimaru's wit, the two head off into a long and perilous journey.

[Official English](https://kodansha.us/series/dororo/)
description.ru:
Даймё Дайго Кагемицу просит у сорока восьми демонов власти над всей Японией - и те согласны выполнить его желание, но назначают высокую цену: они требуют взамен нерождённого ребёнка даймё.  
Он, впрочем, ни секунды не колеблется и отдаёт сына на растерзание. Спустя пару дней после заключения сделки на свет появляется уродливое, искажённое создание, которое счастливый отец велит немедленно выбросить в реку.  
Впрочем, история младенца на этом не оборвётся. Лишённый сорока восьми частей тела, он всё же выживет, вырастет и получит протезы, которые позволят ему встать - и побороться за свою судьбу.
description.tr:
Muromachi / Sengoku dönemi, Daigo Kagemitsu’nun doğacak olan oğlunun gücünü farkeden iblisler, bu çocuk doğmadan önce Daigo Kagemitsu ile bir anlaşma yaparlar. 48 iblisin her biri bu çocuğun birer parçasını alır ve karşılığında Daigo Kagemitsu’ya imparator olması sözünü verirler.  
  
Hyakkimaru adındaki bu bebek, vucudunda 48 parçası eksik doğar ve nehre atılır. Ancak Hyakkimaru ölmez, Jukai adındaki bir doktor Hyakkimaru’yardım eder ve ona eksik vücut parçalarının yerine geçecek yapay parçalar takar. Hyakkimaru büyüdüğünde 48 iblisi öldürüp vücudunu geri almaya karar verir. Ancak yolculuğunda Dororo adlı bir hırsıza rastlar. Hyakkimaru, bir türlü peşini bırakmayan Dororo’ya hayat hikayesini anlatır. İblislerin onu sürekli takip ettiğini ve onun peşini bırakmazsa kendisine zarar geleceğini söylese de bu Dororo’nun daha çok ilgisini çeker ve Dororo, Hyakkimaru’ya vücudu geri almasına yardım etmeye karar verir.

biography.en:
Osamu Tezuka (手塚 治虫, b. 手塚 治, Tezuka Osamu; 3 November 1928 – 9 February 1989) was a Japanese manga artist, cartoonist, and animator. Born in Osaka Prefecture, his prolific output, pioneering techniques, and innovative redefinitions of genres earned him such titles as "the Father of Manga" (マンガの父, Manga no Chichi), "the Godfather of Manga" (マンガの教父, Manga no Kyōfu) and "the God of Manga" (マンガの神様, Manga no Kami-sama). 

Tezuka began what was known as the manga revolution in Japan with his [New Treasure Island](https://mangadex.org/title/d528a5fd-e033-4283-b7e8-a048da2a73aa/new-treasure-island) published in 1947. His output would spawn some of the most influential, successful, and well-received manga series including the children mangas [Astro Boy](https://mangadex.org/title/ca4c84bb-7272-45aa-a22d-dc1282b52372/tetsuwan-atom), [Princess Knight](https://mangadex.org/title/e492584e-566e-4a51-9bf2-9a80f8a911d9/princess-knight) and [Kimba the White Lion](https://mangadex.org/title/bad33763-70c6-40b7-8d14-190556fc55f0/jungle-emperor), and the adult-oriented series [Black Jack](https://mangadex.org/title/fd86eab2-f0f3-47d3-bce5-5628e97f37dc/black-jack), [Phoenix](https://mangadex.org/title/cc647d62-3a2c-474b-ac4e-844256ab185d/hi-no-tori), and [Buddha](https://mangadex.org/title/4e102d46-0a98-4249-8a42-98e4705b663e/buddha), all of which won several awards.

Tezuka died of stomach cancer in 1989. His death had an immediate impact on the Japanese public and other cartoonists. A museum was constructed in Takarazuka dedicated to his memory and life works, and Tezuka received many posthumous awards.
